page.title: 14NOTES
page.content: Vicky Lee of Class1: On Friday, Regimental Sergeant-Major Mason came to our School.He had a pace stick and big black boots.He had a big green suit and a black cap. They are ordinary people like Mums and Dads learning to be soldiers in their spare time at the barracks (Alamein TA Centre). But we all hope there won't be another war. Before the war there were cottages. If you wanted to live in a cottage you had to pay Lord Derby. Kevin Parks of Class1: A man came from the TA Barracks.He was Regimental Sergeant Major Mason. He told us all about the Barracks and brought turnpike maps and tithe maps. He showed us a pace stick and told us who owned the land when the barracks was built.He told us that rich people had horsesand not-so-rich people had to
